properties.comment: The errors that may be displayed by the portlet.
properties.entry: You do not have an account on the Wiki.
The Wiki could not process your request currently. Please try again or contact the Help Desk if the problem persists.
A major error has been detected from the Portal. Please try again or contact the Help Desk if the problem persists.
A security error has prevented communication with the Wiki. Please try again or contact the Help Desk if the problem persists.
The search query appeared to be blank. Please make sure something is in the Search field.
The search query may not start with an asterisk.
